title: Why am I in lower priority queue?
body: I dc'd from one game before it even started cuz my router got disconnected, but that's the only one in my match history (look it up if u want) Does not make any sense.

replies.body: We can't really do much with low priority queue's here on the boards, but if you are curious why you got hit with this LPQ I'd suggest hitting us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That way we can go more in depth about what happened, but you can also look over our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more info.
